details.authority: The Directorate of Enforcement, Southern Regional office, passed order dated 03-11-2023 under Sec.13 of the FEMA, imposing penalty of Rs. 40 Crores on K Raghu Rama Krishna Raju for Violation of the Provisions of Sec.6(3)(b) of FEMA, 1999 r.w. regulation 14 of FEMA (Transfer or issue of security by a person resident outside India) Regulations, 2000 r.w. Para 2 of Schedule I to Regulation 5(1) of FEMA (Transfer to issue of security by a person resident outside India) Regulations 2000 r,w, 42 of FEMA, 1999, The above order was Challenged before the High Court of Telangana by way of W.P. 32313/2023 and the High Court was Pleased to pass interim order dated 03-01-2024 granting stay of all further proceedings. The next listing date of the W.P. is 12-06-2024
